author: Staff Reporter
text:
A gang of unidentified men snatched a gold chain weighing 12 grams, a mobile phone and Rs. 500 cash from a commuter who was walking along the tracks between Pallavaram and Chromepet on Sunday night.

Sources said John (40) of Surya Avenue in Chromepet was intercepted by a gang of four men, who threatened him with a broken bottle. He handed over the valuables to the gang, who fled from the scene immediately in the darkness. John registered a complaint and Government Railway Police Tambaram are investigating. He was returning from an office meeting held at Nungambakkam, police said.
title: Gang robs commuter of gold chain, cash
